full_summary:
### Invitation to Bid: Rogers Pass Staff Housing Design

**Project Overview:**
Parks Canada (APC) is seeking bids for the architectural design and technical support services required to deliver a staff housing development in Rogers Pass, British Columbia. The proposed project consists of developing a conceptual design, a design-build package, and providing technical support and reviews during construction.

**Bidders' Conference:**
A teleconference will be held on September 7, 2023, at 9:00 AM PDT to review the scope of the project and address any questions. Bidders are encouraged to participate.

**Project Timeline:**
Please refer to Appendix D for the project schedule.

**Submission Requirements:**
All inquiries of a technical and contractual nature should be submitted in writing to the contracting authority at least eight business days prior to the tender closing date.

**Submission Method:**
Tenders must be submitted via fax or email to the Contracting Authority. Please note that Parks Canada does not currently accept submissions through SAP Ariba.

**Proposals:**
Online question-and-answer sessions will be accepted, but please ensure that all documents are sent as attachments to an email. The maximum email file size is 15 MB.

**Notice:**
The successful bidder will be selected based on a combination of technical merit and price. The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating.

**Technical Requirements:**
The proposed project must comply with the requirements set out in the National Park Act.

**Submission Deadline:**
Tenders must be received by 4:00 PM MDT on September 26, 2023.

**Contact Information:**
For questions or clarification regarding this bid solicitation, please contact:
Jen Maheu, Contracting Authority
Parks Canada
220 - 4 Avenue SE, Suite 720
Calgary, Alberta
T2G 4X3

Phone: 587-432-8458
Email: [jen.maheu@pc.gc.ca](mailto:jen.maheu@pc.gc.ca)
Fax: 1-855-983-1808

You can download the bid documents from the Government of Canada tendering service at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.



**Free Trade Agreements:**
The contract may involve suppliers from various countries. The bid is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade
